or: ଦୟାକରି ଏକ ନୂତନ ଟିକେଟ୍ ସୃଷ୍ଟି କରିବାକୁ ନିମ୍ନରେ ଥିବା ଫର୍ମ ପୂରଣ କରନ୍ତୁ | ଅଙ୍ଗନୱାଡି କର୍ମୀ 48 ଘଣ୍ଟା ମଧ୍ୟରେ ଆପଣଙ୍କ ନିକଟରେ ପହଞ୍ଚିବ |
indic_trans_translated: Please fill in the following forms to create a new ticket: Anganwadi workers will reach you within 48 hours.

eng: Please note down the ticket number for future reference.
or: ଦୟାକରି ଭବିଷ୍ୟତ ରେଫରେନ୍ସ ପାଇଁ ଟିକେଟ୍ ନମ୍ବର୍ ନୋଟ୍ କରନ୍ତୁ।
indic_trans_translated: Please note down the ticket number for future reference.

eng: Poshan Tracker is a project of Ministry of Women and Child Development.
or: ପୋଷଣ ଟ୍ରାକର ହେଉଛି ମହିଳା ଏବଂ ଶିଶୁ ବିକାଶ ମନ୍ତ୍ରଣାଳୟର ଏକ ପ୍ରକଳ୍ପ ।
indic_trans_translated: POSHAN tracker is a project of the Ministry of Women and Child Development.

eng: Digital India Corporation is the technical partner of MoWCD.
or: ଡିଜିଟାଲ ଇଣ୍ଡିଆ କର୍ପୋରେସନ ହେଉଛି MoWCDର ବୈଷୟିକ ଅଂଶୀଦାର ।
indic_trans_translated: Digital India Corporation is the technology partner of MoWCD.

eng: Poshan Tracker focuses on eradication of malnutrition from India.
or: ପୋଷଣ ଟ୍ରାକର ଭାରତରୁ ପୁଷ୍ଟିହୀନତା ନିରାକରଣ ଉପରେ ଧ୍ୟାନ ଦେଇଥାଏ ।
indic_trans_translated: POSHAN tracker focuses on the prevention of malnutrition in India.

eng: It serves as a mechanism to monitor and improvise on the service delivery under Poshan Abhiyaan
or: ଏହା ପୋଷଣ ଅଭିଯାନ ଅଧୀନରେ ସେବା ବିତରଣ ଉପରେ ନଜର ରଖିବା ଏବଂ ଉନ୍ନତି କରିବା ପାଇଁ ଏକ ପ୍ରଣାଳୀ ଭାବରେ କାର୍ଯ୍ୟ କରେ
indic_trans_translated: It acts as a mechanism to monitor and improve service delivery under POSHAN Abhiyaan

eng: Is poshan trackers app available over Apple I Store also?
or: ଆପଲ୍ ଆଇ ଷ୍ଟୋରରେ ପୋଷନ୍ ଟ୍ରାକ୍ ଆପ୍ ମଧ୍ୟ ଉପଲବ୍ଧ ରହିଛି କି?
indic_trans_translated: Are POSHAN TRACK APP also available on Apple App Store?

eng: Number of records becoming inactive and number of records migrating from one category to another
or: ରେକର୍ଡଗୁଡିକର ସଂଖ୍ୟା ନିଷ୍କ୍ରିୟ ହେବା ଏବଂ ଗୋଟିଏ ବର୍ଗରୁ ଅନ୍ୟ ବର୍ଗକୁ ସ୍ଥାନାନ୍ତରିତ ରେକର୍ଡ୍ ସଂଖ୍ୟା
indic_trans_translated: Number of records disabled and transferred from one class to another

eng: In How many languages the Poshan Tracker App is available?
or: ପୋଷନ୍ ଟ୍ରାକର୍ ଆପ୍ କେତୋଟି ଭାଷାରେ ଉପଲବ୍ଧ ରହିଛି?
indic_trans_translated: Poshan Tracker App is available in how many languages

eng: AWWs are requested to enter their mobile numbers in the Login screen.
or: ଏଡବ୍ଲ୍ୟୁଡବ୍ଲ୍ୟୁମାନଙ୍କୁ ଲଗଇନ୍ ସ୍କ୍ରିନରେ ନିଜର ମୋବାଇଲ୍ ନମ୍ବର ପ୍ରବେଶ କରିବାକୁ ଅନୁରୋଧ କରାଯାଇଛି ।
indic_trans_translated: AWWs have been requested to enter their mobile number on the login screen.

eng: An OTP will be sent to your registered mobile number, post which you are required too set your MPIN.
or: ଆପଣଙ୍କର ପଞ୍ଜୀକୃତ ମୋବାଇଲ୍ ନମ୍ବରକୁ ଏକ ଓଟିପି ପଠାଯିବ, ଯାହାପରେ ଆପଣଙ୍କୁ ଏମ୍ପିଆଇଏନ୍ ସେଟ୍ କରିବାକୁ ପଡିବ ।
indic_trans_translated: An OTP will be sent to your registered mobile number, after which you will be required to set an MPIN.

eng: Measles Containing vaccine (MCV)/MR-2JE-2**DiphtheriaPertussis & Tetanus (DPT)-Booster-1OPV –Booster
or: ମିଳିମିଳା ଧାରଣକାରୀ ଟିକା (MCV) / MR-2JE-2**ଡିଫଥେରିଆପର୍ଟୁସିସ୍ ଏବଂ ଟିଟାନସ୍ (DPT) -ବଷ୍ଟର -1OPV - ବୁଷ୍ଟର
indic_trans_translated: Combination of Vaccine (MCV) / MR-2JE-2 * Deforestation and Tetanus (DPT) -Buster-1OPV-Booster

eng: The MGRS collected primary growth data and related information from approximately 8500 children from widely different ethnic backgrounds and cultural settings (Brazil, Ghana, India, Norway, Oman and the USA)
or: MGRS ପ୍ରାଥମିକ ଅଭିବୃଦ୍ଧି ତଥ୍ୟ ଏବଂ ଆନୁସଙ୍ଗିକ ସୂଚନା ପ୍ରାୟ 8500 ପିଲାଙ୍କ ଠାରୁ ବିଭିନ୍ନ ଜାତିଗତ ପୃଷ୍ଠଭୂମି ଏବଂ ସାଂସ୍କୃତିକ ସେଟିଂସମୂହ (ବ୍ରାଜିଲ, ଘାନା, ଭାରତ, ନରୱେ, ଓମାନ ଏବଂ ଯୁକ୍ତରାଷ୍ଟ୍ର) ରୁ ସଂଗ୍ରହ କରିଥିଲା   |
indic_trans_translated: MGRS collected primary growth data and relevant information from around 8500 children from different ethnic backgrounds and cultural settings (Brazil, Ghana, India, Norway, Oman and USA).

eng: Awareness for Children Stunting, Wasting to prevent malnutrition in children
or: ପିଲାମାନଙ୍କ ପାଇଁ ସଚେତନତା, ପିଲାମାନଙ୍କଠାରେ ପୁଷ୍ଟିହୀନତାକୁ ରୋକିବା ପାଇଁ ଅପଚୟ
indic_trans_translated: Awareness for children, wastage to prevent malnutrition in children

eng: Poshan Tracker adds new application features
or: ପୋଷଣ ଟ୍ରାକର୍ ନୂତନ ଆପ୍ଲିକେସନ୍ ବୈଶିଷ୍ଟ୍ୟଗୁଡିକ ଯୋଡିଥାଏ
indic_trans_translated: The POSHAN tracker adds new application features

eng: Making or Updating Home Visit Planner and Initiating home visits
or: ଘର ପରିଦର୍ଶନ ଯୋଜନା ପ୍ରସ୍ତୁତ କରିବା କିମ୍ବା ଅଦ୍ୟତନ କରିବା ଏବଂ ଘର ପରିଦର୍ଶନ ଆରମ୍ଭ କରିବା
indic_trans_translated: To prepare or update a home visit plan and initiate a home visit

eng: Poshan Calculator is designed to measure growth of the child based on standards defined by World Health Organization (WHO)
or: ବିଶ୍ୱ ସ୍ୱାସ୍ଥ୍ୟ ସଂଗଠନ (WHO) ଦ୍ୱାରା ବ୍ୟାଖ୍ୟା କରାଯାଇଥିବା ମାନାଙ୍କ ଉପରେ ଆଧାର କରି ଶିଶୁର ଅଭିବୃଦ୍ଧି ମାପିବା ପାଇଁ ପୃଷ୍ଟିକର କାଲ୍କୁଲେଟର ଡିଜାଇନ୍ କରାଯାଇଛି
indic_trans_translated: Parental calculator designed to measure child growth based on standards defined by World Health Organization (WHO)

eng: Migrated from one category to another
or: ଗୋଟିଏ ବର୍ଗରୁ ଅନ୍ୟ ବର୍ଗକୁ ସ୍ଥାନାନ୍ତରିତ ହୋଇଛି
indic_trans_translated: Moved from one class to another

eng: It usually occurs when a person has not had food of adequate quality and quantity and/or they have had frequent or prolonged illnesses
or: ଏହା ସାଧାରଣତ ଘଟେ ଯେତେବେଳେ ଜଣେ ବ୍ୟକ୍ତିର ପର୍ଯ୍ୟାପ୍ତ ଗୁଣ ଏବଂ ପରିମାଣର ଖାଦ୍ୟ ନଥାଏ ଏବଂ / କିମ୍ବା ସେମାନଙ୍କର ବାରମ୍ବାର କିମ୍ବା ଦୀର୍ଘସ୍ଥାୟୀ ରୋଗ ହୋଇଥାଏ |
indic_trans_translated: This usually happens when an individual does not have adequate quality and quantity of food and / or have frequent or chronic disease.

eng: Poshan Abhiyaan is India’s flagship programme to improve nutritional outcomes for children, adolescents, pregnant women and lactating mothers by leveraging technology, a targeted approach and convergence.
or: ଶିଶୁ, କିଶୋର, ଗର୍ଭବତୀମାନଙ୍କ ପାଇଁ ପୁଷ୍ଟିକର ପରିଣାମକୁ ସୁଦୃଢ କରିବା ପାଇଁ ପୋଷନ୍ ଅଭିଆନ୍ ହେଉଛି ଭାରତର ଏକ ପ୍ରମୂଖ କାର୍ଯ୍ୟକ୍ରମ ।
indic_trans_translated: POSHAN Abhiyaan is India's flagship programme for strengthening nutrition outcomes for children, adolescents and pregnant women.

eng: Hot Cooked Meal (HCM) given in last 30 days
or: ବିଗତ 30 ଦିନ ମଧ୍ୟରେ ଦିଆଯାଇଥିବା ଗରମ ଭୋଜନ (HCM)
indic_trans_translated: Hot Meals (HCM) served during last 30 days

eng: Uploading of Data of Anganwadi Services Schemes in Poshan Tracker
or: ପୃଷ୍ଟିକର ଟ୍ରାକରରେ ଅଙ୍ଗନୱାଡି ସେବା ଯୋଜନା ଗୁଡିକର ଡାଟା ଅପଲୋଡ୍
indic_trans_translated: Upload data of Anganwadi Services Schemes in the Page Tracker

indic_trans_translated: How one can download the Poshan Tracker App

or: ସ୍ମାର୍ଟ ଫୋନର ମୂଲ୍ୟ ବିଷୟରେ ସ୍ପଷ୍ଟୀକରଣ (03 ଜୁନ୍, 2021)
indic_trans_translated: Clarification regarding Price of Smartphones (June 03, 2021)

eng: along with status update once resolved
or: ଥରେ ସମାଧାନ ହେବା ପରେ ସ୍ଥିତି ଅପଡେଟ୍ ସହ
indic_trans_translated: With status update once resolved

eng: Poshan Tracker adds new Resources on Website
or: ପୋଷଣ ଟ୍ରାକର୍ ୱେବସାଇଟ୍ ବୈଶିଷ୍ଟ୍ୟରେ ନୂତନ ଉତ୍ସ ଯୋଡିଥାଏ
indic_trans_translated: Adds new sources to the POSHAN Tracker website feature

eng: If this is your first time contacting us or you've lost the ticket number, please open a new ticket
or: ଯଦି ଏହା ଆମର ପ୍ରଥମ ଥର ଆମ ସହିତ ଯୋଗାଯୋଗ କରେ କିମ୍ବା ଆପଣ ଟିକେଟ୍ ନମ୍ବର ହରାଇଛନ୍ତି, ଦୟାକରି ଏକ ନୂତନ ଟିକେଟ୍ ଖୋଲନ୍ତୁ
indic_trans_translated: If this is our first contact or you have lost your ticket number, please open a new ticket

eng: Technology under Poshan Tracker is being leveraged for dynamic identification of stunting, wasting, under-weight prevalence among children and last mile tracking of nutrition service delivery
or: ପୋଶାନ୍ ଟ୍ରାକର୍ ଅନ୍ତର୍ଗତ ଟେକ୍ନୋଲୋଜିକୁ ଷ୍ଟଣ୍ଟିଂ, ଅପଚୟ, ପିଲାମାନଙ୍କ ମଧ୍ୟରେ କମ୍ ଓଜନ ପ୍ରାଦୁର୍ଭାବ ଏବଂ ପୁଷ୍ଟିକର ସେବା ବିତରଣର ଶେଷ ମାଇଲ୍ ଟ୍ରାକିଂର ଗତିଶୀଳ ଚିହ୍ନଟ ପାଇଁ ବ୍ୟବହାର କରାଯାଉଛି |
indic_trans_translated: The technology under Apparel Tracker is being used for dynamic tracking of last mile tracking of stunting, wasting, low weight prevalence among children and delivery of nutritional services.

eng: The System also takes feedback about system performance and experience.Information on name, mobile number, date of registration and health status may be used for these purposes
or: ସିଷ୍ଟମ୍ କାର୍ଯ୍ୟଦକ୍ଷତା ଏବଂ ଅଭିଜ୍ଞତା ବିଷୟରେ ମତାମତ ମଧ୍ୟ ନେଇଥାଏ | ଏହି ଉଦ୍ଦେଶ୍ୟରେ ନାମ, ମୋବାଇଲ୍ ନମ୍ବର, ପଞ୍ଜୀକରଣ ତାରିଖ ଏବଂ ସ୍ୱାସ୍ଥ୍ୟ ସ୍ଥିତି ବିଷୟରେ ସୂଚନା ବ୍ୟବହୃତ ହୋଇପାରେ |
indic_trans_translated: The system also takes feedback about performance and experience, for which information such as name, mobile number, registration date and health status can be used.

eng: Tracking of services to the end beneficiary at a click of a button.
or: ଏକ ବଟନ୍ କ୍ଲିକ୍ କରି ଶେଷ ହିତାଧିକାରୀଙ୍କୁ ସେବାଗୁଡିକର ଟ୍ରାକିଂ କର।
indic_trans_translated: Click on the button to track the services rendered to the last beneficiary.

eng: Services like Take Home Ration (THR) and Hot cooked Meal (HCM), vaccination for Infants and Pregnant Women
or: ଘରର ରାସନ ନିଅ (THR) ଏବଂ ରନ୍ଧା ଖାଦ୍ୟ (HCM), ଶିଶୁ ଏବଂ ଗର୍ଭବତୀ ମହିଳାଙ୍କ ପାଇଁ ଟୀକାକରଣ ପରି ସେବାଗୁଡିକ |
indic_trans_translated: Take Home Ration (THR) and Kitchen (HCM) services like immunization for children and pregnant women.

eng: New Poshan Tracker App (13 January, 2021)
or: ନୂତନ ପୋଷନ୍ ଟ୍ରାକର୍ ଆପ୍ (13 ଜାନୁଆରୀ, 2021)
indic_trans_translated: New POSHAN Tracker App (13th January, 2021)

eng: Preventing illnesses to avert Malnutrition and Death

indic_trans_translated: Preventing Malnutrition and Infertility

eng: Scan the QR Code to Download the App
or: ଆପ୍ ଡାଉନଲୋଡ୍ କରିବାକୁ QR କୋଡ୍ ସ୍କାନ୍ କରନ୍ତୁ
indic_trans_translated: Scan the QR code to download the app

indic_trans_translated: Pregnant Women who took Home Ration (THR)

eng: General Awareness on SAM and MAM
or: SAM ଏବଂ MAM ଉପରେ ସାଧାରଣ ସଚେତନତା
indic_trans_translated: General Awareness on SAM and MAM

eng: App can be accessed offline, currently daily tracking feature is available for offline data entry.Offline mode can store latest 3 days data.
or: ନା, ବୈଧ ଇଣ୍ଟରନେଟ୍ ସଂଯୋଗ ବିନା ଆପ୍ କାମ କରିବ ନାହିଁ ।
indic_trans_translated: No, the app will not work without a valid internet connection.

eng: These organizations will not use the APIs/ No-code webpage integration to encourage or promote illegal activity or violation of third-party rights including these Terms with Poshan Tracker.
or: ବେଆଇନ କାର୍ଯ୍ୟକଳାପକୁ ପ୍ରୋତ୍ସାହନ ଦେବା ପାଇଁ କିମ୍ବା ପୃଷ୍ଟିକର ଟ୍ରାକର୍ ସହିତ ଏହି ସର୍ତ୍ତଗୁଡିକ ସହିତ ତୃତୀୟ-ପକ୍ଷ ଅଧିକାରର ଉଲ୍ଲଂଘନକୁ ପ୍ରୋତ୍ସାହନ ଦେବା ପାଇଁ ଏହି ସଂସ୍ଥାଗୁଡିକ API / No-code ୱେବପୃଷ୍ଠା ସଂଯୋଗକୁ ବ୍ୟବହାର କରିବେ ନାହିଁ |
indic_trans_translated: These entities shall not use the API / no-code webpage connection to promote unlawful activities or to promote third party rights violation with these conditions with a background tracker.

eng: Pregnant Women, Lactating Mothers, Children from 6 months to 3 years and adolescent girls.
or: ଗର୍ଭବତୀ ମହିଳା, ସ୍ତନ୍ୟପାନ କରାଉଥିବା ମା, 6 ମାସରୁ 3 ବର୍ଷ ପର୍ଯ୍ୟନ୍ତ ପିଲା ଏବଂ କିଶୋର ବାଳିକା |
indic_trans_translated: Pregnant women, lactating mothers, children between the age of 6 months and 3 years and adolescent girls.

eng: New Poshan Tracker App : CSC-SPV Nodal Person (02 February, 2021)
or: ନୂଆ ପୋଷନ୍ ଟ୍ରାକର୍ ଆପ୍ଃ CSC-SPV ନୋଡାଲ୍ ବ୍ୟକ୍ତି (02 ଫେବୃଆରୀ, 2021)
indic_trans_translated: New Position Tracker App: CSC-SPV Nodal Person (02 February, 2021)

eng: An AWW can use ‘Migrate Beneficiary’ option to migrate a beneficiary from one AWC to another AWC basis their Aadhaar number.
or: ଜଣେ AWW ଏକ ହିତାଧିକାରୀଙ୍କୁ ଗୋଟିଏ AWC ରୁ ଅନ୍ୟ AWC ଆଧାର ନମ୍ବର ଆଧାରରେ ସ୍ଥାନାନ୍ତର କରିବା ପାଇଁ 'ସ୍ଥାନାନ୍ତର ହିତାଧିକାରୀ' ବିକଳ୍ପ ବ୍ୟବହାର କରିପାରିବ |
indic_trans_translated: An AWW can use the 'Transfer Beneficiary' option to transfer one beneficiary from one AWC to another based on the AWC Aadhaar number.

eng: A beneficiary is eligible for HCM for at least 21 days in a month.
or: ଜଣେ ହିତାଧିକାରୀ ଏକ ମାସରେ ଅତି କମ୍ ରେ 21 ଦିନ ପାଇଁ HCM ପାଇଁ ଯୋଗ୍ୟ ଅଟନ୍ତି |
indic_trans_translated: A beneficiary is eligible for HCM for a minimum period of 21 days in a month.

indic_trans_translated: ABHA (Health ID) and its benefits

eng: Children who are identified as deficit on nutrition are eligible for additional food supplements.
or: ପୁଷ୍ଟିକର ଖାଦ୍ୟର ଅଭାବ ବୋଲି ଚିହ୍ନିତ ପିଲାମାନେ ଅତିରିକ୍ତ ଖାଦ୍ୟ ସପ୍ଲିମେଣ୍ଟ ପାଇଁ ଯୋଗ୍ୟ ଅଟନ୍ତି |
indic_trans_translated: Children identified as deficient in nutrition are eligible for additional food supplements.

eng: An underweight person is a person whose body weight is considered too low to be healthy
or: ଜଣେ ଓଜନିଆ ବ୍ୟକ୍ତି ହେଉଛନ୍ତି ଜଣେ ବ୍ୟକ୍ତି, ଯାହାର ଶରୀରର ଓଜନ ସୁସ୍ଥ ରହିବା ପାଇଁ ଅତ୍ୟଧିକ କମ୍ ବୋଲି ବିବେଚନା କରାଯାଏ |
indic_trans_translated: A person who is overweight is considered to be too underweight to be healthy.
